description:
The boon of these road pedals is their super-fast and easy engagement. The retention system holds the rear clasp partially open after release, so you don't have to overcome tension to clip back in. They also have a carbon flexion blade instead of a traditional metal spring, keeping the weight down, and oversized platforms to give you some stomp.

  • Composite body with a steel axle
  • ICLIC makes getting rolling easier, as every time you unclip the retention system stays open, letting just slide right in and ride
  • 3 levels of retention gives you options
  • Pedal platform is 700 square/mm for excellent power transfer and a good surface area to weight ratio
  • Stainless steel metal plate wears well and is replaceable
  • Pontoon sides on cleats provide comfortable walking
  • Minimal distance from sole to pedal axle
  • 2.5mm of lateral float with the included Free cleats
  • 16° release angle
name: Time Xpresso 4 Pedals
